result.pre: system. This study used the exponential smoothing model to forecast

result.pre: public awareness, and tackle the situation effectively. The association between

result.pre: effectively. The study has some significant strong points. First, the

result.pre: study had some limitations as well. First, the cases of
result.post: presented in this study were reported from hospital-based sentinel

result.pre: time. This might be explained by antigenic drift of the
result.post: virus and many unknown factors that affect disease transmission.

result.pre: factors not considered in this study. Conclusion In conclusion, the

result.post: activity in Pakistan. Exponential smoothing model was the best
